column3: It’s hard to see someone living your dream. This video is awesome.

I'm curious why  a lot of people who wear Rapha including guys in the video leave their jersey (vest?) unzipped? I'm in Japan and Rapha riders here are very recognizable for their wind flapping jersey.

column1: OFF COURSE IS OF COURSE - traveling the world
column3: AWESOME FILM!
awesome, makes me want to ride like right now!  Too bad it’s dark and rainy out here 😩
Awesome scenery
Watch... With bated breath, Like leaves on a winter day, Rapha clothing flapping in the wind,And snacks.
I love Colorado
Gorgeous.

Any video with Gus and/or Lachlan is diamonds.  EF and Rapha were smart to pic these boys up.  I think capturing the story behind the riders makes watching the races more appealing and is a winning formula for Rapha this year.  It’s more than just supplying kits this year, I feel we are going to get some great stories from the peloton.  Looking forward to more Rapha!
About time rapha made another great video 😊🤘
Now I just need to figure out how to spend a couple of months in Colorado 🤔
Nice film. Wish I was there.
so outskirts colorado coming soon

Gotta winter storm coming ...soaking up every minute of this wonderful video.
Better when Gus doesn't talk.  haha.
*Heads-up!* The GPX file for Independence Pass is the same as for Flagstaff Road - any chance you could fix the link, Rapha?

Loving the addition of the GPX files at the end of the article. So many bloggers/writers tell you about their fantastic journeys and then fail to give you the opportunity to see for yourself.Kudos Rapha!
Finally, the real Rapha videos are back!
can we have the name of the producers? love to know about the process
This is unreal.
